Do you want to enable an extra casus belli for a more hectic start? \n Note: it can also be toggled per decision
This will enable an extra casus belli so counts (Shattered World) or dukes (Reign of Princes) can attack their neighbours.
This will disable the extra casus belli so only the normal expansion methods are allowed.
